abstract: BHP Billiton, which is bidding $133 billion for Rio Tinto Group, will seek talks with Aluminum Corporation of China after the latter bought a potential blocking stake in Rio Tinto last month.
lead_paragraph: BHP Billiton, which is bidding $133 billion for Rio Tinto Group, will seek talks with Aluminum Corporation of China after the latter bought a potential blocking stake in Rio Tinto last month.

headline.main: BHP Seeks Talks With Chinalco on Rio Tinto
